mapper.select: SELECT vernacularName, count(*) AS count FROM Clean_data GROUP BY vernacularName ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude FROM Clean_data WHERE vernacularName LIKE "%"#{name}"%" LIMIT 100;

select vernacularName from(select ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{latitude}*PI()/180-decimalLatitude*PI()/180)/2),2)+ COS(#{latitude}*PI()/180)*COS(decimalLatitude*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{longitude}*PI()/180- decimalLongitude*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS distance,c.vernacularName FROM Clean_data as c having distance <= 10000 AND distance >= 5000) tableN group by vernacularName

select ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{latitude}*PI()/180-decimalLatitude*PI()/180)/2),2)+ COS(#{latitude}*PI()/180)*COS(decimalLatitude*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{longitude}*PI()/180- decimalLongitude*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS distance,c.vernacularName,c.decimalLongitude,c.decimalLatitude FROM Clean_data as c WHERE vernacularName LIKE "%"#{animalName}"%" having distance <= 20000 AND distance >= 5000 limit 10
mapper.sql: id, dataResourceUid, license, informationWithheld, individualCount, year, month, day, stateProvince, decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, geodeticDatum, coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, verbatimLatitude, verbatimLongitude, taxonConceptID, scientificName, order, family, genus, scientificNameAuthorship, vernacularName, verbatimBasisOfRecord, species, recordID, verbatimScientificName
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from Clean_data
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into Clean_data (id, dataResourceUid, license, informationWithheld, individualCount, year, month, day, stateProvince, decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, geodeticDatum, coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, verbatimLatitude, verbatimLongitude, taxonConceptID, scientificName, order, family, genus, scientificNameAuthorship, vernacularName, verbatimBasisOfRecord, species, recordID, verbatimScientificName) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataresourceuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{informationwithheld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{individualcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decimallatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{decimallongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geodeticdatum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coordinateuncertaintyinmeters,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verbatimlatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verbatimlongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxonconceptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scientificname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{family,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scientificnameauthorship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vernacularname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verbatimbasisofrecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{species,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verbatimscientificname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
